heroSection.heading: CONF W-SHOP

3 days of web3 conference and workshops sessions
organized by the Polkadot Community

1.name: main stage
1.description: Auditorium  will be dedicated to the the web3 topics

2.name: second stage
2.description: "Salle du Haut Conseil" will be  dedicated to the Polkadot ecosystem: conferences, panels and workshops

3.name: Networking space
3.description: The pillar room will be divided into into 4 spaces to host:
list: NFT exhibition with TakTik screens and technology
a press room space will be deployed in the lodges

4.name: Special evening events
4.description: "La Salle du Haut Conseil" and the rooftop will host:
list: networking event on the first day
networking party on the second day

aboutSection.heading: What is pasrisdotcomm?
aboutSection.description:
A 3-day blockchain conference in Paris, highlighting the Polkadot ecosystem, focusing on the blockchain world, real-world applications, and fostering collaboration. The event features expert-led discussions, project presentations, workshops, and networking opportunities for professionals and enthusiasts in the blockchain industry.

Offering an inclusive space to meet, greet, talk and exchange thoughts, and perhaps kick off the next interesting collaboration.

venueSection.heading: VENUE
venueSection.description: was designed to create strong and durable cultural ties while cultivating constructive dialogue between the Arab World, France, and Europe. Since its creation it has become a place of cultural exchange in Paris but also an interlocutor in the field of mathematics and research.
